segments.text: This book I'm reading about Yoga is really interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know you did Yoga .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't really practice it regularly yet , I'm just learning about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now I'm learning about the importance of breathing slow , deep and regularly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As opposed to short and shallow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It says here , ' He who only half breathes , half lives . '
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I read something like that once . I think it was , ' Life is in the breath . '
segments.speaker: S2
